metadata.name: Root_User_Failed_to_Login
metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule detects admin failed login

ruleText:
rule AWS_Root_User_Failed_to_Login 
{

  meta:
    name = "Root_User_Failed_to_Login"
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule detects admin failed login"
    severity = "Low"
    mitre_ttp = ""
    mitre_mitigation = ""


  events:
    $e.metadata.vendor_name = "AMAZON"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "AWS CloudTrail"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "admin" or $e.target.application = "Admin" or $e.target.user.attribute.roles.type = "ADMINISTRATOR"
    $e.security_result.action = "BLOCK"

  condition:
    $e
}
